sentences.en: Also factor calls to other constructors, to minimize duplication.
sentences.cn: 同样, 提炼出对基类构造函数的调用来使重复最少.

sentences.en: DNA content are duplicated at interphase stage during chromosome duplication.
sentences.cn: DNA物质在间期之中在染色体复制时倍增.

sentences.en: Duplication of bands in this region also shown by trifluoropropyne and perfluoro 2 - butene.
sentences.cn: 三氟丙炔和全氟丁烯 -2 在这个区域也出现双重谱带.

sentences.en: Duplication of bands in this region is also shown by trifluoropropyne and perfluoro 2 - butene.
sentences.cn: 三氟丙炔和全氟丁烯 -2 在这个区域也出现双重谱带.

sentences.en: Duplication of bands in this region is also shown by trifluoropropyne and perfluoro 2 - butyne.
sentences.cn: 三氟丙炔和全氟丁炔 -2 在这个区域也出现双重谱带.

sentences.en: Enclosed is the duplication of our countersigned sales contract.
sentences.cn: 随函附上业经我方会签的销售合同.

sentences.en: Great video audio quality for region free dvd duplication.
sentences.cn: 伟大的视频音频质量,为地区的免费DVD复制.

sentences.en: In addition to being wasteful, duplication may be inconvenient and irritating to consumers.
sentences.cn: 重复投资不仅造成浪费, 也会给消费者带来不便和激起不满.

sentences.en: Is this a duplicate or the original?
Provide the service of information office, conference room, typewriting and duplication, etc.
sentences.cn: 提供信息厅 、 会议室 、 打字、复印等服务.

sentences.en: Results 18 cases of renal duplication were diagnosed by CTU, confirmed by operation.
sentences.cn: 结果　CTU诊断 重复肾输尿管18例,合并重复输尿管下端囊肿8例,重复输尿管异位开口10例, 全部经手术证实.

sentences.en: The digitization provides an efficient way for information store, duplication and transfer.
sentences.cn: 数字化为信息的存储 、 复制及传输提供了便利.

sentences.en: The inferior vena cava duplication is a rare congenital anomaly.
sentences.cn: 下腔静脉重复畸形是一种罕见的先天性血管发育变异.

sentences.en: There could be a serious loss of efficiency through unnecessary duplication of resources.
sentences.cn: 不必要的资源重复会导致严重的效率损耗。

sentences.en: Try to avoid wasteful duplication of effort.
sentences.cn: 尽量避免无用的重复劳动。

sentences.en: We prefer to use a default argument because it reduces code duplication.
sentences.cn: 我们更喜欢使用默认实参,因为它减少代码重复.

sentences.en: We will attempt to avoid duplication by appropriate cross references.
sentences.cn: 将用适当的前后对照的方法来避免重复.

words.tran_cn: 可加倍的；可再发生的，可复制的

trans.tran_en: If you say that there has been duplication of something, you mean that someone has done a task unnecessarily because it has already been done before
